Jupiter.Discovered: Known to the ancients and visible to the naked eye.
Jupiter.Atmosphere Comp: 90% Hydrogen, 10% Helium, 1% Other Gases, Hydrogen is metallic in this high pressure state.
Jupiter.Satellites: Io, Europa, Ganymede, Callisto, Amaltheo, Himalia, Elara, Pasiphae, Sinope, Lysithea, Carme, Anake, Leda, Thebe, Adrastea, Metis, Callirrhoe, Themisto, Megaclite, Taygete, Chaldene, Harpalyke, Kalyke, Locaste, Erinome, Isonoe, Praxidike, Autonoe, Thyone, Hermippe, Aitne, Eurydome, Euanthe, Euporie, Orthosie, Sponde, Kale, Pasitihee, Hegemone, Mneme, Aoede, Thelxinoe, Arche, Kallichore, Helike, Carpo, Eukelade, Cyllene, Kore, Herse, S/2010 J 1, S/2010 J 2, Dia, S/2003 J 3, S/2003 J 4, S/2003 J 5, S/2003 J 9, S/2003 J 10, S/2003 J 12, S/2003 J 15, S/2003 J 16, S/2003 J 18, S/2003 J 19, S/2011 J 1, S/2011 J 2
Jupiter.Visited: Pioneer 10-11, Voyager 1-2, Galileo Orbiter, Galileo Probe, Cassini, Ulysses, New Horizons, Juno
